title: How to Use Favourites in a Pathology Request?
body:
This section will explore how to use the favourites feature in a pathology request form, both setting it up and using it. 
1. First you need to navigate to the New Pathology Request form.
2. Once here you need to type within the Custom Test box the message you would like to mark as favourite.
3. Hit Enter, and you will see the Custom Test in the field.
4.  Click the More button
5. Now you need to enter the name of this favourite. Once done you can then hit Ok.
6. Now the favourite will show in the far-left box.
5. By double clicking on the favourite's name, it will then appear in the box next to it without needing to type anything.
